member.name: T:RedirectDemo.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:RedirectDemo.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:RedirectDemo.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:RedirectDemo.Form1.SendInput(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a string to the child process
member.param: The string to write to the client process's StdIn pipe

member.name: M:RedirectDemo.Form1.BG_GetOutput
member.summary: Reads output from the process and writes it to the output box. Run on a background thread

member.name: M:RedirectDemo.Form1.DestroyHandles
member.summary: Closes open handles to processes and pipes

member.name: M:RedirectDemo.Form1.ProcessEnded
member.summary: Enables the start button again and write an appropiate message to the output textbox. Thread safe

member.name: M:RedirectDemo.Form1.WriteToOutputBox(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a string to the output textbox. Thread safe
member.param: The string to write to the output box
